introduce.title: About Hollow Knight Silksong
introduce.label: Game Info
introduce.description: Hollow Knight: Silksong is Team Cherry's sequel featuring the deadly hunter Hornet's new adventure in the Silksong world. Silksong release date confirmed!

items.title: New Protagonist Hornet - Silksong Hero
items.description: Play as the deadly hunter Hornet, master silk-like abilities in the mysterious Silksong kingdom. Silksong release date approaching - prepare for the new experience!

items.title: 200+ Unique Enemies - Silksong Challenges
items.description: Battle over 200 new enemies in moss grottos, coral forests, and gilded cities. The Silksong world is full of unknown challenges.

items.title: Hand-drawn Art - Silksong Visual Feast
items.description: Immerse yourself in the beautiful hand-drawn 2D world, experiencing Team Cherry's unique artistic style in Silksong.

faq.name: faq
faq.label: FAQ
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions About Silksong Release
faq.description: Get the latest information and answers about Hollow Knight: Silksong release.

items.title: Is the Silksong release date confirmed?
items.description: Yes! Hollow Knight Silksong will officially release on September 4, 2025. This Silksong release date has been officially confirmed by Team Cherry, and the long-awaited sequel is finally coming.

items.title: What platforms will Silksong release on?
items.description: Hollow Knight Silksong will release simultaneously on multiple platforms including Steam, PlayStation, Xbox, Nintendo Switch, and more. All platforms will be available on the Silksong release date.

items.title: What new features does Silksong have compared to the original?
items.description: Silksong features Hornet as the protagonist with a new silk ability system, 200+ unique enemies, and upgraded hand-drawn art style. The Silksong world is larger and more complex than the original, bringing players a completely new experience.

items.title: How can I get the latest Silksong updates?
items.description: Follow our Silksong Hub website for timely updates on Silksong release date information, game guides, development progress, and more. You can also follow Team Cherry's official social media.

items.title: What's the estimated playtime for Silksong?
items.description: According to Team Cherry, Hollow Knight Silksong's content will be no less than the original game, with an estimated 20-30 hours for the main story and 50+ hours for completionists. The Silksong world is full of exploration content.

items.title: Can I pre-order Silksong now?
items.description: Yes, major platforms have opened pre-orders for Hollow Knight Silksong. We recommend pre-ordering to ensure you can experience the game on the Silksong release date.
